## DataSource.setStyleSet() method

Invoked by \[\[MapView\]\] to notify when the \[\[Theme\]\] has been changed.

If `DataSource` depends on a `styleSet` or `languages`<!-- -->, it must update its tiles' geometry.

@<!-- -->deprecated, Use \[\[setTheme\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setStyleSet(styleSet?: StyleSet, definitions?: Definitions, languages?: string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  styleSet | [StyleSet](./harp-datasource-protocol.styleset.md) | The new theme that \[\[MapView\]\] uses. |
|  definitions | [Definitions](./harp-datasource-protocol.definitions.md) |  |
|  languages | string\[\] | An optional list of languages for the <code>DataSource</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
